name: 3dDegreeCentrality
author: Nipype (interface)
description:
3dDegreeCentrality, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.afni.preprocess, interface: DegreeCentrality).
Performs degree centrality on a dataset using a given maskfile via 3dDegreeCentrality
For complete details, see the `3dDegreeCentrality Documentation. <https://afni.nimh.nih.gov/pub/dist/doc/program_help/3dDegreeCentrality.html>`_

inputs.name: Autoclip
inputs.description: A boolean. Clip off low-intensity regions in the dataset.

inputs.name: Automask
inputs.description: A boolean. Mask the dataset to target brain-only voxels.

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Input file to 3ddegreecentrality.

inputs.name: Mask
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Mask file to mask input data.

inputs.name: Oned file
inputs.description: A string. Output filepath to text dump of correlation matrix.

inputs.name: Sparsity
inputs.description: A float. Only take the top percent of connections.

inputs.name: Thresh
inputs.description: A float. Threshold to exclude connections where corr <= thresh.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Output image file name.

output-files.name: Oned file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. The text output of the similarity matrix computed after thresholding with one-dimensional and ijk voxel indices, correlations, image extents, and affine matrix.
